column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The Brussel sprouts are amazing. Hands down. The best we've ever had!!! Go there now and order them!! Topped with Honey balsamic glaze with caramelized onion (we left the pancetta off)
column2: these were fresh and so delicious! The Poutine fries are really good
column3: as is the French onion soup. We also ordered a vanilla latte with Oat Milk
column5: refreshing and perfect. The walnut chocolate chip cookie was decent
column6: but probably wouldn't order that again. Overall
column7: it's definitely worth the trip. The fresh baked breads looked great also.
